title: Teaching Methodology Practical Competency Enhancement: Foundational Online International Relations Analysis Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can explain major international relations theories (realism, liberalism, constructivism) with over 80% accuracy
Can analyze and evaluate the decision-making process of international organizations in three or more stages based on given cases
Can perform basic statistical analysis using international conflict datasets and visualize the results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
